content: अपक्रमः {@--1@} Going away, flight, escape, retreat. {@--2@} The place or limit to which one may retreat; विक्षिपत्येष विक्षेपं चंद्रादीनामपक्रमात् <ls>Sūrya S.</ls> {@--3@} Gliding or passing away (of time). {%--<ab>a.</ab>%} [अपगतः क्रमो यस्मात्] {@--1@} Without order {@--2@} Irregular, in wrong order.
